CutSceneText.Text: Thank you, young Daeva, for making me whole again.
I am Niobus, Priest of the Zumion Shrine.
It has been a thousand years since Mesramtaeda cursed me to spend eternity as a statue.
And in those years, my shrine has been reduced to dust and broken stone....
But where you see ruins, my eyes see the glory that was!
And I am still its priest.
May my blessing grant you strength and courage.
